testcase.name: Verifying Correct Product is ordered
testcase.system-out: Given User is on SauceDemo Login Page.......................................passed And User should enter "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"....................passed And User should add Product to the Cart.....................................passed And User should checkout and enter "Kamaleshwar","Murthy" and "600100"......passed Then Validate whether ordered the correct product...........................passed

testcase.name: Verifying Particular product is available
testcase.system-out: Given User is on SauceDemo Login Page.......................................passed And User should enter "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"....................passed And Should get all the product list.........................................passed Then Validate whether Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt product is available..........passed

testcase.name: Verifying price with product listing with product individual page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on SauceDemo Login Page.......................................passed And User should enter "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"....................passed And Getting the price of all Product and removing the dollar symbol.........passed Then Validate the price with product listing with product individual page...passed

testcase.name: Verifying LoginPage with invalid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on SauceDemo Login Page.......................................passed And User should enter invalid "standard_us1r" and "secret_sau7e"............passed Then Validate the error message.............................................passed
